name: DayNight
description:
A simple button extension to toggle between light/dark shell and gtk theme.

This extension currently assumes that your current theme's dark version is already installed and the dark theme's name is

appended to the original theme name (for example if the light theme is named 'Pop', the dark themes name is taken as 'Pop-dark').The theme is changed to Adwaita by gnome itself in case the dark theme is not found.
